EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Randall, Just scan and email. I only need one document the (I-9 form) back. The only other thing I need from you is your clients contact information when you are ready to send it. Thank you!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Randall Thacker [mailto:randst27@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 1:11 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Call Follow Up Thanks - do I mail the signed documents to you or just scan and email? Is there anything else you need from me at this time? From: Sara Conde < <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> To: Randall Thacker < <mailto:randst27@yahoo.com">randst27@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 12:56 PM Subject: RE: MBO Partners Call Follow Up Hi Randall, Sounds good. Most companies want to use their own contract so I am used to that. I think the disability is pretty good if it were me, I would do it. If you want details on it visit <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html">http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
